question: Which country's state-owned defense manufacturing enterprise is "STC Delta"?
explanation: STC Delta is Georgia's state-owned defence manufacturing enterprise. The State Military Scientific-Technical Center "DELTA" (SMSTC Delta) - a legal entity of public law established by the decree of the President of Georgia, its full name is Legal Entity of Public Law - State Military Scientific-Technical Center "DELTA". The scope of work of the organization is mainly focused on the Defense Industry and to some extent on the Civilian Field. The Center is an organization separate from state governing bodies. Its state control is exercised by the Ministry of Defense of Georgia The mission of the organization is based on the state interests of Georgia and the national defence strategy. The main task of the Center is to promote the development of the national military industry.
